pullRequest.title: Upgrade to JUnit 4.13.1. Fixes #827
pullRequest.bodyText:
I have broken the PR down in separate commits to make it easy for the review. Most of the changes are straightforward.
Please note, I have purposely not updated the copyright to make it easy for the review. We are almost in November now, and my plan is that in January I will update all copyright headers to the new year to make it easy for the contributors next year.

beforeCommit.message:
Replace usage of Verify.assertThrows() by Assert.assertThrows().

Signed-off-by: Nikhil Nanivadekar <nikhil.nanivadekar@bnymellon.com>

afterCommit.message:
Replace usage of Verify.assertThrows() by Assert.assertThrows().

Signed-off-by: Nikhil Nanivadekar <nikhil.nanivadekar@bnymellon.com>

nodes.bodyText: Suggestion to make this Assert.assertThrows instead of a static import, so it is consistent with the rest of the assertions in this class. Same comment for lines 331 and 495.
Why is this changed, but the ones above for slf4j are not?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -11,12 +11,15 @@
     </content>

commit.message:
Remove assertNotEquals() from Verify as Assert already has the same API.

Signed-off-by: Nikhil Nanivadekar <nikhil.nanivadekar@bnymellon.com>

Remove Verify.assertThrows() which takes a Runnable in favor of Assert.assertThrows(). This is a breaking change.

Signed-off-by: Nikhil Nanivadekar <nikhil.nanivadekar@bnymellon.com>

Replace usage of Verify.assertThrows() by Assert.assertThrows().
